timeline.message:
Edited javadoc of checkAttributeSemantics

- edited thrown exceptions in checkAttributeSyntax methods
- also fixed bugs where checkAttributeSyntax was not called (in virtual attributes googleGroupsName and unixGroupName)

timeline.author: zlamalp
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -36,13 +36,11 @@

 	 * @throws InternalErrorException if an exception is raised in particular
 	 *         implementation, the exception is wrapped in InternalErrorException
-	 * @throws WrongAttributeValueException if the attribute value is wrong/illegal
-	 * @throws WrongReferenceAttributeValueException if an referenced attribute against
-	 *         the parameter is to be compared is not available
+	 * @throws WrongReferenceAttributeValueException if the attribute value is wrong/illegal semantics

timeline.bodyText: Not your change, but can you please either update this or remove it. It was probably copy-pasted from fillAttribute().
